title: CUPCAKES
description: From the author of Coffee Cakes comes a baking book devoted exclusively to the cupcake, that sublime children's sweet that no one is too old to enjoy. This glorious collection features 70 easy to prepare and infinitely adaptable recipes for moist and delicious cupcakes--plus recipes for 30 frostings, fillings, glazes and sauces.
author: Ceri Hadda
